Title: The Big Bad Fox and Other Tales...
Writer: Benjamin Renner (comics "Le grand méchant renard" and "Un bébé à livrer"), Benjamin Renner (screenplay), Jean Regnaud (screenplay), David Freedman (english adaptation), Lyn Freedman (english adaptation), Declan May (additional material)
Actors: Guillaume Darnault, Damien Witecka, Kamel Abdessadok, Antoine Schoumsky
Plot: Whoever thinks that the countryside is calm and peaceful is mistaken. In it we find especially agitated animals, a Fox that thinks it's a chicken, a Rabbit that acts like a stork, and a Duck who wants to replace Father Christmas. If you want to take a vacation, keep driving past this place.
